snippet: After New Jersey lawmakers questioned whether lane closings on the George Washington Bridge in September were politically motivated, David Wildstein, who ordered them, said he would leave in January.
lead_paragraph: After New Jersey lawmakers questioned whether lane closings on the George Washington Bridge in September were politically motivated, David Wildstein, who ordered them, said he would leave in January.

headline.main: Christie Ally Resigning From Port Authority

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
